tweet.text: On July 6, 1988, Secretary Shultz began his longest visit to East Asia and the Pacific, a two-week trip that included 8 countries and Hong Kong. Shultz’s trip itinerary and speech excerpts were printed in the October 1988 Department of State Bulletin: https://t.co/Jq3eRlYRxw
tweet.html: On July 6, 1988, Secretary Shultz began his longest visit to East Asia and the Pacific, a two-week trip that included 8 countries and Hong Kong. Shultz’s trip itinerary and speech excerpts were printed in the October 1988 Department of State Bulletin:
